00018 /*
00019  * Checkpointer.h
00020  *
00021  *
00022  *
00023  *  Created on: 07-Mar-2011
00024  *      Author: shravanm
00025  */
00026 
00027 #ifndef CHECKPOINTER_H_
00028 #define CHECKPOINTER_H_
00029 
00030 #include <string>
00031 
00032 //!Used to implement failure recovery
00033 /**
00034  * The checkpointer interface.
00035  * A checkpointer object helps create a checkpoint and
00036  * also to load from a checkpoint
00037  *
00038  * A checkpointer has two things:
00039  * 1. Metadata - (Ex.: The iteration at which this checkpoint was created)
00040  * 2. The method to serialize the necessary data structures to disk
00041  *
00042  */
00043 class Checkpointer {
00044 public:
00045     //!Serialize the metadata
00046     virtual void save_metadata(std::string& state) = 0;
00047     //!Load the metadata
00048     virtual std::string load_metadata() = 0;
00049     //!Serialize other necessary data structures
00050     virtual void checkpoint() = 0;
00051 };
00052 
00053 #endif /* CHECKPOINTER_H_ */
